title: During a Monster's attack:
text:
- y Monsters will not make any Combat Manoeuvres (unless specified on their cards).

- y The 3 dice that inflict the maximum damage will be selected to execute the attack before any Monsterspecific Combat Manoeuvres are considered.

- y A Monster's attack dice can never be re-rolled.

- y A Monster never suffers from the 'Distracted' modifier.

- y If a Monster with multiple weapons has an enemy pushed/ placed/end its activation within the monster's melee reach, it will only attack with its melee weapon.
